author: Wayne Collins
method: Place the bourbon, vermouth, bitters and syrup into a mixing glass filled with ice and stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist and a maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz bourbon ,  25ml/1fl oz sweet red vermouth ,  2 dashes Angostura bitters ,  1 tsp syrup from a jar of maraschino cherries ,  twist orange zest, to garnish ,  maraschino cherry, to garnish
